Brand: Dr. Bronner's

Category: Bar Soap

Ingredients: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Aqua, fragrance, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sea Salt, Citric Acid, T
Salt, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Eugenol, Linalool, Limonene
